summary: This function transverses an iterable in order to find the maximum value therein.
returns: Return the maximum value found in the iterable.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val values = [301, 401, 500, 402, 302];%0A%0A    val first = F::first(values);%0A    val last = F::last(values);%0A    val min = F::minimum(values);%0A    val max = F::maximum(values);%0A%0A    F::println(%22First = %22 .. first);%0A    F::println(%22Last = %22 .. last);%0A    F::println(%22Min = %22 .. min);%0A    F::println(%22Max = %22 .. max);%0A}
